@graph.name: GC MS using XCMS
@graph.description:
XCMS and RAMClustR based workflow for data processing and annotation using library matching via matchms.

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [GC MS using XCMS](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/metabolomics/tutorials/gc_ms_with_xcms/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
